title._content: Presidential Train Ascending the Mountain at Alarcon

description._content: Title: Presidential Train Ascending the Mountain at Alarcon Creator: Schlattman Hnos. [Hermanos], Foto's Date: December 11-12, 1897 Part Of: Inaugural celebration of the Mexico, Cuernavaca & Pacific Railway Physical Description: 1 photographic print: albumen; 17.8 x 22 cm. on 25.5 x 30.5 cm. mount File: ag1982_0146_204_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu.
